title: Recipe Fusion: Garlic Steak Bites with Miso Butter Broccoli

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 1
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the marinate for the meat. In a large bowl add
bullets: ¼ cup olive oil
3 tablespoons soy sauce

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 2
bullets: Trim excess fat from  1½ pounds sirloin steak and cut into 1-inch pieces
Add the cut steak pieces to the bowl with olive oil and soy sauce
Toss the steak to coat
Let it marinate on the counter

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 4
bullets: Cut broccoli florets and tender stems into bite-size pieces (about 6-8 cups)
Place broccoli pieces on a large sheet pan
Drizzle 2 tablespoons olive oil and ¼ teaspoon kosher salt
Toss to coat
Spread broccoli in a single layer

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 5
bullets: In a small bowl, place 1 tablespoon room-temperature butter and 2 teaspoons white miso
Use a fork to mash the butter and miso together in the small bowl
Cut 1 lime in half and set aside

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 6
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the other ingredients for the meat, they will be added together
bullets: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter
Mince 2 large garlic cloves

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 7
preparationSteps.mainStep: Gather and prepare the finish ingredients for the meat
bullets: Chop the parsley leaves and tender stems
Flaky salt
Freshly cracked black pepper

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 1
cookingSteps.mainStep: Preheat the oven to 425°F. (in case you missed this step in the preparation)
bullets: Place the large sheet pan with broccoli in the preheated oven
Roast broccoli until the stalks are easily pierced with a fork (15 minutes)
Wait 5 minutes and start the second step (5 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 2
cookingSteps.mainStep: Heat a large 12-inch cast-iron or heavyweight skillet over medium-high heat until very hot (2 minutes)
bullets: Using a slotted spoon, add the steak bites in a single layer, shaking off excess marinade
Cook steak until browned, turn steak pieces with tongs when they easily release (6 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 3
cookingSteps.mainStep: Turn off heat for the meat
bullets: Add the 1 Tablespoon of butter and 2 large garlic cloves, minced
Push steak around to coat and mix everything together

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 4
bullets: Transfer meat to a serving plate
Drizzle meat with any remaining sauce from the pan
Top with chopped parsley, a sprinkle of flaky salt, and freshly cracked black pepper

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 5
cookingSteps.mainStep: When broccoli 15 minute timer is up, remove broccoli from oven
bullets: Immediately add the miso-butter mixture
Squeeze half the lime juice over the broccoli and stir everything together, scraping up any brown bits from the bottom of the sheet pan.
Taste and season with additional salt and remaining lime juice as needed
Serve warm or at room temperature

Spread broccoli in a single layer
Of fresh parsley leaves and tender stems, chopped
